item.title: Keith add a quote by Ken Wilber
item.description: "The truth will not necessarily set you free, but truthfulness will." -- Ken Wilber

item.title: Keith add a quote by Hafiz of Shiraz
item.description: "I wish I could show you when you are lonely or in darkness the astonishing light of your own being." -- Hafiz of Shiraz

item.title: Keith add a quote by Hafiz
item.description: "What we speak becomes the house we live in." -- Hafiz

item.title: Keith add a quote by Hafiz
item.description: "This place where you are right now, God circled on a map for you." -- Hafiz

item.title: Keith add a quote by Hafiz
item.description: "One regret, dear world, That I am determined not to have When I am lying on my deathbed Is that I did not kiss you enough. a" -- Hafiz

item.title: Keith add a quote by شمس الدین محمد حافظ / Shams-al-Din Mohammad Hafez
item.description:
"It happens all the time in heaven, And some day
It will begin to happen Again on earth -
That men and women who are married, And men and men who are Lovers,
And women and women Who give each other Light,
Often will get down on their knees
And while so tenderly Holding their lover's hand,
With tears in their eyes, Will sincerely speak, saying,
My dear, How can I be more loving to you;
How can I be more kind?" -- شمس الدین محمد حافظ / Shams-al-Din Mohammad Hafez

item.title: Keith add a quote by شمس الدین محمد حافظ / Khwāja Šams ud-Dīn Muhammad Hāfez-e Šīrāzī
item.description:
"The heart is a The thousand-stringed instrument
That can only be tuned with Love." -- شمس الدین محمد حافظ / Khwāja Šams ud-Dīn Muhammad Hāfez-e Šīrāzī

item.title: Keith add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "There is another language beyond language, another place beyond heaven and hell. Precious gems come from another mine, the heart draws light from another source." -- Rumi

item.title: Keith add a quote by RUMI
item.description: "I have lived on the lip of insanity, wanting to know reasons, knocking on a door. It opens. I've been knocking from the inside." -- RUMI

item.title: Keith add a quote by George Orwell
item.description: "All animals are equal, but some animals are more equal than others." -- George Orwell
